modules.name: Alert Dialog
modules.description: Display a simple alert dialog in the hooked browser.
modules.explanation: Demonstrates basic hook verification by surfacing a harmless alert banner.
modules.result: Simulator output: a consent banner notified the user about the lab exercise.

modules.name: Prompt Dialog
modules.description: Ask the user for input using the browser's prompt dialog.
modules.explanation: Collects voluntary input to illustrate data capture UX without storing responses.
modules.result: Simulator output: prompt captured placeholder text and discarded it immediately.

modules.name: Confirm Dialog
modules.description: Show a confirmation dialog with OK and Cancel options.
modules.explanation: Highlights consent-driven branching logic within the hook sandbox.
modules.result: Simulator output: user acknowledged the simulated consent request.

modules.name: Browser Details
modules.description: Gather user agent and browser details.
modules.explanation: Reports the canned browser profile assigned to each hook for situational awareness.
modules.result: Simulator output: Firefox 115 ESR on Kali Linux (lab profile).

modules.name: Detect Plugins
modules.description: List plugins exposed by the browser.
modules.explanation: Summarizes which demo plugins ship with the sandboxed workstation profile.
modules.result: Simulator output: 3 trusted plugins (PDF viewer, WebRTC, Demo Reporter).

modules.name: Play Sound
modules.description: Play an audio clip in the hooked browser.
modules.explanation: Triggers a short tone so learners can confirm command delivery.
modules.result: Simulator output: emitted a 440 Hz acknowledgement beep in the sandbox.

modules.name: Change Background
modules.description: Change the page background color.
modules.explanation: Visualizes DOM manipulation with an easily reversible style tweak.
modules.result: Simulator output: background switched to lab highlight green.

modules.name: Open New Tab
modules.description: Open a new tab to a given URL.
modules.explanation: Demonstrates navigation control without leaving the lab-approved domain.
modules.result: Simulator output: launched a new tab pointed at the offline lab manual.

modules.name: Redirect Browser
modules.description: Redirect the current page to another URL.
modules.explanation: Explains how forced navigation works while staying within the offline sandbox.
modules.result: Simulator output: frame redirected to the static "safe-landing" page.

modules.name: Fetch URL
modules.description: Perform a fetch request to a chosen URL.
modules.explanation: Illustrates asynchronous requests; results are sourced from local fixtures only.
modules.result: Simulator output: retrieved offline HTML fixture (2 KB).

modules.name: Get Cookies
modules.description: Retrieve document cookies from the hooked browser.
modules.explanation: Shows how data exfiltration would look; the simulator emits placeholder keys only.
modules.result: Simulator output: session_id=LAB-ONLY; theme=dark.

modules.name: List Local Storage
modules.description: Enumerate items in localStorage.
modules.explanation: Demonstrates client storage review with scrubbed lab-mode entries.
modules.result: Simulator output: ['labBannerDismissed', 'themePreference'].

modules.name: List Session Storage
modules.description: Enumerate items in sessionStorage.
modules.explanation: Highlights volatile storage review as part of blue-team readiness drills.
modules.result: Simulator output: ['csrfToken', 'activeWizardStep'].

modules.name: Get Geolocation
modules.description: Request the browser's current geolocation.
modules.explanation: Explains permission prompts and privacy boundaries using mocked coordinates.
modules.result: Simulator output: 37.7749° N, 122.4194° W (lab default).

modules.name: Clipboard Theft
modules.description: Read text from the clipboard with permission.
modules.explanation: Discusses how clipboard access is mediated; only lab-approved strings appear.
modules.result: Simulator output: 'red-team-lab-notes'.

modules.name: Port Scanner
modules.description: Scan a set of ports on the client network.
modules.demo: // Demo only: no real scanning performed
modules.explanation: Outlines how timing-based scans operate while keeping network probes disabled.
modules.result: Simulator output: ports 80, 443 marked open on lab-gateway.example.

modules.name: Network Scanner
modules.description: Attempt to discover internal network hosts.
modules.explanation: Visual walkthrough of subnet discovery using offline topology data.
modules.result: Simulator output: discovered 3 lab hosts (workstation, gateway, training wiki).

modules.name: Keylogger
modules.description: Log keystrokes typed by the user.
modules.explanation: Explains keystroke capture ethics; simulator streams canned training text only.
modules.result: Simulator output: 'authorized training exercise'.

modules.name: Screenshot
modules.description: Capture a screenshot of the current page.
modules.explanation: Covers evidence capture considerations by replaying a static PNG preview.
modules.result: Simulator output: embedded PNG of the lab landing page (not saved).

modules.name: Webcam Snapshot
modules.description: Take a snapshot from the user's webcam.
modules.explanation: Discusses consent requirements while substituting a stock "training room" frame.
modules.result: Simulator output: placeholder image showing an empty training room.
